code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with mild pallor, mild easy fatigability and mild fatigue. These symptoms are present for about 10 days. patient is a 61 yr old male. o:Height 166 cm, Weight 71.4 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16, Skin = pallor, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Hemolytic Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed prednisone - 1 mg/kg daily, and ordered CBC, Direct Antiglobulin (Coombs) test.
